statements: SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claimant_name FROM claims_data WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 1000.00;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM claims_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_date FROM claims_data WHERE claimant_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM claims_data WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE ORDER BY claim_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 10000 AND claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claimant_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND is_fraudulent = FALSE ORDER BY claim_id ASC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claimant_name = 'John Doe' AND claim_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, is_fraudulent FROM claims_data WHERE claimant_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentClaims;
SELECT claim_description, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_description FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FraudulentClaims WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_id ASC;
SELECT CLAIM_ID, CLAIM_DESCRIPTION, CLAIM_AMOUNT FROM Claims WHERE claim_id = 5;

SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_description, f.fraudulent_claim_id, f.detection_method FROM Claims c JOIN FraudulentClaims f ON c.claim_id = f.claim_id WHERE f.detection_method = 'Investigation' ORDER BY c.claim_id ASC;
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_description, c.claim_amount, f.detection_method FROM Claims c LEFT JOIN FraudulentClaims f ON c.claim_id = f.claim_id WHERE f.detection_date IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS average_amount, MAX(claim_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(claim_amount) AS min_amount FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM claims_data;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_dob FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, policy_holder_name FROM claims_data JOIN policy_holders ON claims_data.policy_holder_id = policy_holders.policy_holder_id;
SELECT claim_id, fraud_detection_score, fraud_detection_status FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE fraud_detection_status = 'high';
SELECT * FROM claims_data INNER JOIN policy_holders ON claims_data.policy_holder_id = policy_holders.policy_holder_id
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims_data WHERE claim_amount > 10000
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_holder_dob FROM policy_holders WHERE policy_holder_dob < '1990-01-01'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, fraud_detection_score FROM claims_data INNER JOIN fraudulent_claims ON claims_data.claim_id = fraudulent_claims.claim_id
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, policy_holder_name, policy_holder_address FROM claims_data INNER JOIN policy_holders ON claims_data.policy_holder_id = policy_holders.policy_holder_id
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT claim_id, claim_type, amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Providers.provider_name, Transactions.amount FROM Customers JOIN Transactions ON Customers.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id JOIN Providers ON Transactions.provider_id = Providers.provider_id WHERE Transactions.amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Transactions ON Customers.customer_id = Transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital'
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT claim_id, customer_name, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, claim_date FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.amount FROM Customers c JOIN Transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.amount > 5000 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT p.policy_type, p.coverage, t.amount FROM Policies p JOIN Transactions t ON p.policy_id = t.transaction_id WHERE p.coverage >= 0.8 AND t.amount <= 2000;
SELECT fc.reason, c.customer_name FROM FraudulentClaims fc JOIN Claims c ON fc.claim_id = c.claim_id WHERE fc.reason = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY c.claim_date DESC;
